experiences.title: Student Software Engineer
desc: Successfully completed a 16-week Full Stack Software Development Program

experiences.title: Data Annotation Specialist
desc: Implemented autopilot labeling interface to label images critical to training the company’s deep neural network
Gained essential computer vision and machine learning knowledge to better understand how the learning algorithms use labels
Interacted with Computer-Vision Engineers to help improve the design of the labeling interface

experiences.title: Summer Legal Intern/Legal Assistant
desc: Filed motions regarding matrimonial, estate, and zoning lawsuits at the Kings County Supreme & Civil Courts
Prepared and reviewed a wide range of legal documents for staff attorneys prior to and during trial preparation
Served parties in various types of lawsuits throughout the boroughs of New York City to initiate legal action

experiences.title: Program Administrator/Athletics Director
desc: Led in daily before-school operations during early mornings and afternoons for children in grades K-2
Tutored children in their academics (Math and English) to ensure student’s full understanding of course material
Spearheaded athletic department to ensure proper lesson planning for students
Coordinated weekly teaching plans in order to lead children, ages 4-6 in their introduction to athletic activities
Reported daily to the Program Director, and Head Counselors to ensure proper methods of instruction and communication
Established meticulous guidelines to allow for a safe learning environment

projects.title: Let'sChat
projects.desc: Developed a web application that allows for real-time messaging between users. Built using the React.js library to create dynamic and reusable components. Administered Firebase hosting services in order to receive and store live data and for Google authentication. Embedded HTML and Tailwind CSS in UI styling for easy-to-understand functionality and a pleasant viewing environment for users.

projects.title: OrbitSim
projects.desc: Simulates and visualizes the orbital path of the planets in our solar system via a 2D model. Constructed a physics model using real-time astronomical values to generate an accurate planetary orbit. Applied Pygame for the creation of computer graphics.

projects.title: Cloud.ly
projects.desc: Soley assembled a web application that displays the weather information of the user’s city of choice. Integrated semantic styling utilizing HTML & CSS for an instinctive UI experience. Implemented weatherAPI to parse data using Express for real-time information.
